page.title: 12The Parish Council
page.content: A parish is a small area of country. Welshampton is a parish in North Shropshire.There are seven members of the council.There is an election every four years.There are two women on the council.The Clerk's job is to do clerical work, to write the minutes of the meeting. The council discusses local matters and makes decisions.The safety of the school children is being discussed at the moment.A building that has been put up without planning permission is also being discussed.An adventure playground is being considered, to be built in the school grounds.
